text: Ablaberoides is a genus of beetles within the family Melolonthidae.Bisby F.A., Roskov Y.R., Orrell T.M., Nicolson D., Paglinawan L.E., Bailly N., Kirk P.M., Bourgoin T., Baillargeon G., Ouvrard D. (red.) (27 augusti 2011). "Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: 2011 Annual Checklist". Species 2000: Reading, UK. == Selected species == * Ablaberoides fahraei * Ablaberoides flavipennis * Ablaberoides oscurifrons * Ablaberoides pavoninus * Ablaberoides tardus * Ablaberoides testaceipennis ==References== Category:Melolonthinae Category:Beetle genera
title: Ablaberoides
